item.description:
Blue Hills Hike
WHEN : Sunday, August 14th  

EVENT : Explore the Blue Hills on a 6 to 7 mile rolling hike. This will be a chance to visit the beautiful Blue Hills Reservation if you have not been there and have a good hike with Mosaic members.  After the Hike we are planning on stopping for some lunch and cooling of with a swim in Houghton's Pond. Bring water, lunch and a bathing suit if you want to swim. There are bathrooms available at the pond.

To learn more about the Park go to: http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/metroboston/houghtonsPond.htm

Trip's Coordinators are: Steven Kostic and Stuart Green.

﻿ RSVP: Reply and we can give you either Steve or Stuart's email to get more information.

MEET : Gather at 10:15 a.m. at the gazebo/concession stand at Houghton’s Pond at 695 Hillside St., Milton.

Cost: $5 unless you are a full member of Mosaic
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP to get more details and make arrangements to meet

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: A Hike in the Blue Hills Reservation
